revised_title: Developmental Stages and Anatomy of Apteryx Embryos
tldr: The author studied the development and anatomy of Apteryx embryos, focusing on the stages from A to K, and provided a detailed description of the specimens' external and internal features. The research aimed to understand the evolution and classification of birds, with a focus on the unique characteristics of Apteryx. The author also compared the development of Apteryx embryos to that of chicken embryos, highlighting differences in limb positioning and other features.
